paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for BRCA2, including penetrance data and functional studies.

functional_data.summary: This variant is associated with alternative splicing that may attenuate its pathogenicity.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is part of a group of splice site variants that may produce alternative transcripts.
key_quotes: Expression of these transcripts did attenuate the impact of predicted LoF variants such as the canonical splice site variants c.631+2T>G.

key_quotes: Expression of these transcripts did attenuate the impact of predicted LoF variants such as the canonical splice site variants c.517-2A>G.

functional_data.summary: This variant is associated with alternative splicing that may attenuate its pathogenicity.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is part of a group of nonsense variants that may produce alternative transcripts.
key_quotes: In line with the previously demonstrated functionality of variant DelEx12 (51% HDR), variant c.491T>A revealed a moderate functional impact.

functional_data.summary: This variant is associated with alternative splicing that may attenuate its pathogenicity.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is part of a group of nonsense variants that may produce alternative transcripts.
key_quotes: As shown for the DelEx4–7 variant this alternative transcript encodes a HDR-competent protein isoform.

functional_data.summary: This variant is associated with alternative splicing that may attenuate its pathogenicity.

variants.additional_notes: This variant is part of a group of nonsense variants that may produce alternative transcripts.
key_quotes: Variant c.6901G>T almost exclusively produced the ∆(E12) transcript.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
